name: screate-svg-component
description: Converts normal svg file to react-native-svg component

scripts.test: ts-node src/index.ts --in X:/Download/test/svg-new --out X:/Download/test/svg-converted --move X:/Download/test/svg-old --suffix Svg --tabSize 4 --template templates/svg.template --overwrite
scripts.test:nomove: ts-node src/index.ts --in X:/Download/test/svg-new --out X:/Download/test/svg-converted --suffix Svg --tabSize 4 --template templates/svg.template --overwrite

author: Ari Kankainen
